{"id":"4fc8a674-d04a-47c6-b1d6-4e3e970aff11","name":"Next.js Admin Dashboard with User Authentication (Email/OAuth) and Role-Based Access","timestamp":1750093137425,"messages":[{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"<user_query>
Build a fully responsive, production-ready Admin Dashboard Web App using Next.js, that includes:

â€ 1. User Authentication
Implement secure login using either:

Email-password auth, OR

OAuth via Google or GitHub (recommended: NextAuth.js)

All users can log in, but only admin users can access admin-specific features.

Admin detection should be handled using a simple role-based access control system.
</user_query>"}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"thinking","thinking":"The user wants me to build a fully responsive, production-ready Admin Dashboard Web App using Next.js with user authentication. This is a comprehensive request that involves creating a complete application from scratch.

Let me break down what I need to do:

1. Set up a Next.js project
2. Implement authentication (they suggest NextAuth.js with OAuth)
3. Create a role-based access control system
4. Build a responsive admin dashboard
5. Make it production-ready

I should start by exploring the current workspace to see if there's anything there, then create the project structure.","signature":""},{"type":"text","text":"I'll build a production-ready Admin Dashboard with Next.js and NextAuth.js authentication. Let me start by updating the package.json with all necessary dependencies:"}],"tool_calls":[{"id":"toolu_bdrk_01RR7bkGKCpQqzUMU3jinh34","type":"function","function":{"name":"edit_file","arguments":"{"target_file": "package.json", "instructions": "Replace the entire package.json with Next.js and all required dependencies for the admin dashboard", "code_edit": "{\n \"name\": \"admin-dashboard\",\n \"version\": \"0.1.0\",\n \"private\": true,\n \"scripts\": {\n \"dev\": \"next dev\",\n \"build\": \"next build\",\n \"start\": \"next start\",\n \"lint\": \"next lint\"\n },\n \"dependencies\": {\n \"next\": \"14.0.4\",\n \"react\": \"^18\",\n \"react-dom\": \"^18\",\n \"next-auth\": \"^4.24.5\",\n \"@next-auth/prisma-adapter\": \"^1.0.7\",\n \"prisma\": \"^5.7.1\",\n \"@prisma/client\": \"^5.7.1\",\n \"@heroicons/react\": \"^2.0.18\",\n \"chart.js\": \"^4.4.1\",\n \"react-chartjs-2\": \"^5.2.0\",\n \"clsx\": \"^2.0.0\",\n \"tailwind-merge\": \"^2.2.0\"\n },\n \"devDependencies\": {\n \"typescript\": \"^5\",\n \"@types/node\": \"^20\",\n \"@types/react\": \"^18\",\n \"@types/react-dom\": \"^18\",\n \"autoprefixer\": \"^10.0.1\",\n \"postcss\": \"^8\",\n \"tailwindcss\": \"^3.3.0\",\n \"eslint\": \"^8\",\n \"eslint-config-next\": \"14.0.4\"\n }\n}"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"edit_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_bdrk_01RR7bkGKCpQqzUMU3jinh34","content":"The apply model made the following changes to the file:

```
